title: Butternut squash, sage and crème fraîche mash
description: Sweet and buttery squash paired with fragrant sage and crème fraîche for a bit of zing.
ingredients: 1.5kg/3lb 5oz butternut squash, peeled, seeds removed, cut into 2cm/1in pieces
40g/1½oz parmesan (or a similar vegetarian hard cheese), coarsley grated
salt and freshly ground black pepper
